Name: FPS Arena Online
About the game: FPS Arena Online (F.P.S.A.O) is a social PVP based non-competitive first-person shooter experience. Battle your friends in a casual first-person shooter deathmatch of up to 10 players max. Conquer the arena & assert your dominance among the other players. Key Features Server Browser Players can browse through a list of active servers created by a host or simply search for random lobby to join. Server are able to be password locked on creation by hosts. Locked servers are tagged green while open servers are tagged yellow. Weapons Expect a variety of basic weapons to choose from. Weapons can be purchased from player toggled buy menus. Players always start with a basic pistol from the beginning of the match. Weapons drop on player kill and can be retrieved by other players in the game before they de-spawn. Maps We consider our maps to be a big part of gameplay visually. Enjoy a variety of different maps with their own unique themes. Game Modes (currently) Free-for-all Deathmatch Social Aspects Meet new people in our player community by joining random matches of up to 10-players max or rumble in the arena with your friends. F.P.S.A.O Offers in game text chat much like you would see in any MMO in the lobby while players join and also in-game while in the midst of the battle.
